data.name: ASPxPivotGridImagesEditors
data.value: Provides access to the settings that define images displayed in the editors, used to edit filter values within the Prefilter Control (Filter Editor).

data.name: ASPxPivotGridImages
data.value: Provides access to the settings that define images displayed within the pivot grid's elements.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridGroups
data.value: Gets the collection of field groups.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridFields
data.value: Provides access to a pivot grid's field collection.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridEncodeHtml
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control keeps any of its values that are HTML as HTML, or instead, strips out the HTML markers.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridEnableRowsCache
data.value: Gets or sets whether data caching is enabled.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridEnablePagingGestures
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether an end-user can switch pages with a swipe gesture.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridEnablePagingCallbackAnimation
data.value: Gets or sets whether a specific animation effect is used when changing pages.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridEnableCallBacks
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the callback or postback technology is used to manage round trips to the server.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridEnableCallbackCompression
data.value: Gets or sets whether callback result compression is enabled.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridEnableCallbackAnimation
data.value: Gets or sets whether a specific animation effect is used when the control content is updated via a callback.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridDataSourceID
data.value: Gets or sets the ID of the control from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridDataSource
data.value: Gets or sets the object from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridCustomizationFormImages
data.value: Gets the settings that define images displayed in the Customization Form.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridCustomizationFieldsVisible
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the pivot grid's Customization form is displayed within the page.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridCustomizationFieldsTop
data.value: Gets or sets the Y-coordinate of the Customization form's top-left corner.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridCustomizationFieldsLeft
data.value: Gets or sets the X-coordinate of the Customization form's top-left corner.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridCssClass
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that specifies the ASpxPivotGrid's style.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridColumnCount
data.value: Gets the number of columns displayed within the ASPxPivotGrid.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridCollapsedStateStoreMode
data.value: Gets or sets how the grid stores information about the collapsed rows/columns.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridClientSideEvents
data.value: Gets an object that lists the client-side events specific to the ASPxPivotGrid.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridClientInstanceName
data.value: Gets or sets the pivot grid's client programmatic identifier.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the text to render in an HTML caption element in an ASPxPivotGrid.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridAccessibilityCompliant
data.value: Enables support for Section 508.

data.name: ASPxPivotCustomizationControlLayout
data.value: Gets or sets the ASPxPivotCustomizationControl's layout.

data.name: ASPxPivotCustomizationControlImages
data.value: Gets the settings that define images displayed in the ASPxPivotCustomizationControl.

data.name: ASPxPivotCustomizationControlDeferredUpdates
data.value: Gets or sets whether dragging fields within the ASPxPivotCustomizationControl immediately updates the layout of fields in the PivotGrid control.

data.name: ASPxPivotCustomizationControlClientInstanceName
data.value: Gets or sets the ASPxPivotCustomizationControl's client programmatic identifier.

data.name: ASPxPivotCustomizationControlASPxPivotGridID
data.value: Gets or sets the ID of the owner ASPxPivotGrid control.

data.name: ASPxPivotCustomizationControlAllowSort
data.value: Gets or sets whether the sort order of field values can be toggled via the ASPxPivotCustomizationControl.

data.name: ASPxPivotCustomizationControlAllowFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether filtering can be applied to fields via the ASPxPivotCustomizationControl.

data.name: ASPxPivotCustomizationControlAllowedLayouts
data.value: Gets or sets which layouts can be applied to the ASPxPivotCustomizationControl.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridOLAPDataProvider
data.value: Gets or sets which data provider should be used to bind to an OLAP cube.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridOLAPConnectionString
data.value: Specifies a connection string to a cube in an MS Analysis Services database.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridJSProperties
data.value: Enables you to supply any server data that can then be parsed on the client.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridIsPrefilterPopupVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Filter Editor (Prefilter) is visible.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridIsDataBound
data.value: Gets a value indicating whether the grid is data bound.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridImagesPrefilterControl
data.value: Provides access to the settings that define images displayed within the Prefilter (Filter Editor).

data.name: ASPxPivotGridOptionsBehavior
data.value: Provides access to pivot grid behavior options.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridOptionsChartDataSource
data.value: Provides access to the chart options.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridOptionsCustomization
data.value: Provides access to the pivot grid's customization options.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridOptionsData
data.value: Provides access to the pivot grid's data specific options.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridOptionsDataField
data.value: Provides access to options, which control the presentation of data fields in the ASPxPivotGrid.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridOptionsLoadingPanel
data.value: Provides access to the loading panel's settings.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridOptionsOLAP
data.value: Provides access to the pivot grid's OLAP mode specific options.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridOptionsPager
data.value: Provides access to the pivot grid's pager options

data.name: ASPxPivotGridOptionsView
data.value: Provides access to the ASPxPivotGrid control's view options.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridPagerItemCount
data.value: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and cannot be used directly from your code.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridPagerItemsPerPage
data.value: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and cannot be used directly from your code.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridPagerPageCount
data.value: Gets the number of pages displayed within the ASPxPivotGrid.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridPagerPageIndex
data.value: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and cannot be used directly from your code.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridPopupMenuMenuType
data.value: Gets the context menu's type.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridPrefilter
data.value: Gets the Prefilter's settings.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridRowCount
data.value: Gets the total number of rows displayed within the ASPxPivotGrid.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridSaveStateToCookies
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether cookies are used to persist the information about the control.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridSaveStateToCookiesID
data.value: Gets or sets the name (identifier) of the cookie in which the ASPxPivotGrid's state is persisted.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridStyles
data.value: Provides access to the style settings that control the appearance of the pivot grid's elements.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridStylesEditors
data.value: Provides access to style settings that paint editors, used to edit filter values within the Filter Editor (Prefilter).

data.name: ASPxPivotGridStylesFilterControl
data.value: Provides access to the style settings used to paint the Filter Editor (Prefilter).

data.name: ASPxPivotGridStylesPager
data.value: Provides access to the style settings that control the appearance of the pager displayed within the pivot grid.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridStylesPrint
data.value: Provides access to style settings that allow the export appearance of the pivot grid (and its visual elements) to be defined.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridSummaryText
data.value: Gets or sets a value that describes the ASPxPivotGrid's contents.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridToolTip
data.value: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and cannot be used directly from your code.

data.name: ASPxPivotGridVisibleRowsOnPage
data.value: Gets the number of rows displayed on the current page.

data.name: FieldValueCellDataField
data.value: Gets the data field which identifies the cell.

data.name: FieldValueCellField
data.value: Gets the field whose value the cell represents.

data.name: FieldValueCellParent
data.value: Gets the parent of the current cell.

data.name: PivotCustomizationFormImagesBottomPanelOnly1by4Layout
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed within the 'Areas Section Only (1 by 4)' item of the Customization Form Layout context menu.

data.name: PivotCustomizationFormImagesBottomPanelOnly2by2Layout
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed within the 'Areas Section Only (2 by 2)' item of the Customization Form Layout context menu.

data.name: PivotCustomizationFormImagesColumnAreaHeaders
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed above the Column Area section of the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotCustomizationFormImagesDataAreaHeaders
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed above the Data Area section of the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotCustomizationFormImagesFieldListHeaders
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed above the Hidden Fields section of the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotCustomizationFormImagesFilterAreaHeaders
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed above the Filter Area section of the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotCustomizationFormImagesRowAreaHeaders
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed above the Row Area section of the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotCustomizationFormImagesStackedDefaultLayout
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed within the 'Fields Section and Areas Section Stacked' item of the Customization Form Layout context menu.

data.name: PivotCustomizationFormImagesStackedSideBySideLayout
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed within the 'Fields Section and Areas Section Side-By-Side' item of the Customization Form Layout context menu.

data.name: PivotCustomizationFormImagesTopPanelOnlyLayout
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed within the 'Fields Section Only' item of the Customization Form Layout context menu.

data.name: PivotFieldValueStyleTopAlignedRowValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether row values are top-aligned.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateContainerColumnField
data.value: Gets the innermost column field to which the rendered cell corresponds.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateContainerDataField
data.value: Gets the data field that identifies the column to which the rendered cell belongs.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateContainerItem
data.value: Gets an object that contains the necessary information on the rendered cell.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateContainerRowField
data.value: Gets the innermost row field which corresponds to the rendered cell.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateContainerText
data.value: Gets the display text of the cell currently being rendered.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateContainerValue
data.value: Gets the data value calculated for the cell currently being rendered.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateItemColumnField
data.value: Gets the innermost column field to which the processed cell corresponds.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateItemColumnFieldIndex
data.value: Gets the index of the field to which the templated cell belongs.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateItemColumnIndex
data.value: Gets the visual index of the column that contains the processed cell.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateItemColumnValueType
data.value: Gets the type of the column which contains the processed cell.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateItemDataField
data.value: Gets the data field that identifies the column to which the processed cell belongs.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateItemRowField
data.value: Gets the innermost row field which corresponds to the processed cell.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateItemRowFieldIndex
data.value: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and cannot be used directly from your code.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateItemRowIndex
data.value: Gets the visual index of the row that contains the processed cell.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateItemRowValueType
data.value: Gets the type of the row which contains the processed cell.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateItemSummaryValue
data.value: Gets the summary value currently being processed.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateItemText
data.value: Gets the display text of the cell currently being rendered.

data.name: PivotGridCellTemplateItemValue
data.value: Gets the value of the cell currently being rendered.

data.name: PivotGridClientSideEventsAfterCallback
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the JavaScript function or the entire code which will handle the client ASPxClientPivotGrid.AfterCallback event.

data.name: PivotGridClientSideEventsBeforeCallback
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the JavaScript function or the entire code which will handle the client ASPxClientPivotGrid.BeforeCallback event.

data.name: PivotGridClientSideEventsCellClick
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the JavaScript function or the entire code which will handle the ASPxClientPivotGrid.CellClick client event.

data.name: PivotGridClientSideEventsCellDblClick
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the JavaScript function or the entire code which will handle the ASPxClientPivotGrid.CellDblClick client event.

data.name: PivotGridClientSideEventsCustomizationFieldsVisibleChanged
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the JavaScript function or the entire code which will handle a client pivot grid's ASPxClientPivotGrid.CustomizationFieldsVisibleChanged event.

data.name: PivotGridClientSideEventsInit
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the JavaScript function or the entire code which will handle the client Init event.

data.name: PivotGridClientSideEventsPopupMenuItemClick
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the JavaScript function or the entire code which will handle a client pivot grid's ASPxClientPivotGrid.PopupMenuItemClick event.

data.name: PivotGridCustomTotalCollectionItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to individual items within the PivotGridCustomTotalCollection.

data.name: PivotGridEmptyAreaTemplateContainerArea
data.value: Gets the area for which the template's content is being instantiated.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAllowedAreas
data.value: Gets or sets the areas within which the field can be positioned.

data.name: PivotGridFieldCellStyle
data.value: Gets style settings for cells.

data.name: PivotGridFieldCustomTotals
data.value: Gets the collection of custom totals for the current field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldExportBestFit
data.value: Gets or sets whether the columns corresponding to the current field should be resized to the minimum width required to completely display their contents when exporting the pivot grid.

data.name: PivotGridFieldFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the database field that is assigned to the current PivotGridField object.

data.name: PivotGridFieldGroupIndex
data.value: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and cannot be used directly from your code.

data.name: PivotGridFieldHeaderStyle
data.value: Gets the field's style settings.

data.name: PivotGridFieldID
data.value: Gets or sets the field's unique identifier name.

data.name: PivotGridFieldInnerGroupIndex
data.value: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and cannot be used directly from your code.

data.name: PivotGridFieldMinWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the field minimum width when the pivot grid is exported.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptions
data.value: Contains the field's options.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueStyle
data.value: Gets style settings used to paint field values.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplateContainerField
data.value: Gets a field for which the template's content is being instantiated.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplateContainerHtmlText

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplateContainerItem
data.value: Gets an object that contains the necessary information on the rendered field value.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplateContainerMaxIndex
data.value: Gets the maximum row index (for row fields) or column index (for column fields) that corresponds to the rendered field value.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplateContainerMinIndex
data.value: Gets the minimum row index (for row fields) or column index (for column fields) that corresponds to the rendered field value.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplateContainerText
data.value: Gets the display text of the field value currently being rendered.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplateContainerValue
data.value: Gets the data value of the field value currently being rendered.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplateContainerValueItem
data.value: Gets an object that contains the necessary information on the rendered field value.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplateItemCollapsedImage
data.value: Gets the settings which define the image within the field's expand button when the field is collapsed.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplateItemField
data.value: Gets the field being processed.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplateItemImageOnClick
data.value: Gets the java script code that realizes a field value's expanding/collapsing functionality.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplateItemIsAnyFieldSortedByThisValue
data.value: Gets whether any field is sorted by the processed field value.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplateItemValueItem
data.value: Gets an object that contains the necessary information on the processed field value.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTotalStyle
data.value: Gets style settings used to paint totals.

data.name: PivotGridFieldWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of columns that correspond to the current field when the pivot grid is exported.

data.name: PivotGridHeaderTemplateContainerField
data.value: Gets a field for which the template's content is being instantiated.

data.name: PivotGridImagesCustomizationFieldsBackground
data.value: Gets the settings which define the image displayed as the Customization window's background.

data.name: PivotGridImagesCustomizationFieldsClose
data.value: Gets the settings which define the image displayed within the Customization window's Close button.

data.name: PivotGridImagesDataHeadersPopup
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed within the Data Header Area when data fields are temporarily hidden.

data.name: PivotGridImagesDragArrowDown
data.value: Gets the settings which define the arrow down image displayed during drag operations.

data.name: PivotGridImagesDragArrowLeft
data.value: Gets the settings which define the left arrow image displayed during drag operations.

data.name: PivotGridImagesDragArrowRight
data.value: Gets the settings which define the right arrow image displayed during drag operations.

data.name: PivotGridImagesDragArrowUp
data.value: Gets the settings which define the arrow up image displayed during drag operations.

data.name: PivotGridImagesDragHideField
data.value: Gets the settings which define the hide field image displayed during drag operations.

data.name: PivotGridImagesFieldValueCollapsed
data.value: Gets the settings which define the image displayed within the field's expand button when the field is collapsed.

data.name: PivotGridImagesFieldValueExpanded
data.value: Gets the settings which define the image displayed within the field's expand button when the field is expanded.

data.name: PivotGridImagesFilterWindowSizeGrip
data.value: Gets the settings that define the size grip image within the Filter Window.

data.name: PivotGridImagesGroupSeparator
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed between fields in a group.

data.name: PivotGridImagesHeaderActiveFilter
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed within the filter button when filtering is applied.

data.name: PivotGridImagesHeaderFilter
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed within the filter button.

data.name: PivotGridImagesHeaderSortDown
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image that indicates the descending sort order of fields.

data.name: PivotGridImagesHeaderSortUp
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image that indicates the ascending sort order of fields.

data.name: PivotGridImagesPrefilterButton
data.value: Gets the settings of an image displayed within the prefilter button.

data.name: PivotGridImagesSortByColumn
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed within column or row headers. This image indicates that column or row field values are sorted by this column/row summary's values.

data.name: PivotGridImagesTreeViewNodeLoadingPanel
data.value: Gets the settings that define the image displayed near the group filter node while it is expanding.

data.name: PivotGridStylesAreaStyle
data.value: Gets the style settings used to paint all pivot grid header areas, including the column header area, row header area, data header area, and filter header area.

data.name: PivotGridStylesPrefilterBuilderMainAreaStyle
data.value: Gets the style settings used to paint the prefilter's content area.

data.name: PivotGridStylesPrefilterBuilderModalBackgroundStyle
data.value: Gets style settings that define the appearance of the page displayed behind the invoked Prefilter window.

data.name: PivotGridStylesPrefilterPanelCheckBoxCellStyle

data.name: PivotGridStylesRowAreaStyle
data.value: Gets the style settings used to paint the row header area.

data.name: PivotGridStylesTotalCellStyle
data.value: Gets the style settings used to paint total cells.

data.name: PivotGridWebGroupFields
data.value: Provides access to the group's field collection.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsChartDataSourceCurrentPageOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether data from the current page only is passed to the chart control.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsCustomizationCustomizationExcelWindowHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the height of the Customization Form, when it is painted in the Excel2007 style.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsCustomizationCustomizationExcelWindowWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of the Customization Form, when it is painted in the Excel2007 style.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsCustomizationCustomizationWindowHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the height of the Customization Form, when it is painted in the Simple style.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsCustomizationCustomizationWindowWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of the Customization Form, when it is painted in the Simple style.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsCustomizationFilterPopupWindowHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the filter window's height.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsCustomizationFilterPopupWindowMinHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum allowed filter window height.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsCustomizationFilterPopupWindowMinWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum allowed filter window width.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsCustomizationFilterPopupWindowResizeMode
data.value: Gets or sets how a filter popup window visually responds to resizing operations.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsCustomizationFilterPopupWindowWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the filter window width.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsDataLockDataRefreshOnCustomCallback
data.value: Gets or sets whether refreshing pivot grid data is locked while handling the ASPxPivotGrid.CustomCallback event.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsLayoutResetOptions
data.value: Gets or sets which options are reset before loading the layout.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsLoadingPanelEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a specific loading panel is displayed during callback processing.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsLoadingPanelImage
data.value: Gets the settings of an image displayed within a Loading Panel.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsLoadingPanelImagePosition
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the image displayed within a Loading Panel with respect to the panel's text content.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsLoadingPanelStyle
data.value: Gets the style settings used to paint the Loading Panel.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsLoadingPanelText
data.value: Gets or sets the text displayed within a loading panel.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsPagerAlwaysShowPager
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Pager is displayed within the ASPxPivotGrid when there is only one page.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsPagerColumnPageIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the active column page in the virtual scrolling mode.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsPagerColumnsPerPage
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of columns displayed on a page in the virtual scrolling mode.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsPagerPageIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the page currently being selected.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsPagerPagerAlign
data.value: Gets or sets the pager's horizontal alignment within the pivot grid.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsPagerRowsPerPage
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of rows displayed within a page. Setting this property to 0 hides the Pager.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsViewDataHeadersDisplayMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies how data headers are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsViewDataHeadersPopupMaxColumnCount
data.value: Gets or sets a value limiting the number of data field headers displayed in a row (line) of the field headers popup.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsViewDataHeadersPopupMinCount
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum number of data fields required to temporarily hide data field headers within a hidden panel.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsViewEnableContextMenuScrolling
data.value: Gets or sets whether to enable context menu scrolling.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsViewEnableFilterControlPopupMenuScrolling
data.value: Gets or sets whether scrolling popup menus invoked in the Prefilter window is allowed.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsViewHorizontalScrollBarMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying the horizontal scroll bar's display mode.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsViewHorizontalScrollingMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying the horizontal scrolling mode.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsViewShowContextMenus
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can invoke the context menus.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsViewShowHorizontalScrollBar
data.value: Gets or sets whether the horizontal scrollbar is displayed.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsViewVerticalScrollBarMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying the vertical scroll bar's display mode.

data.name: PivotGridWebOptionsViewVerticalScrollingMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying the vertical scrolling mode.

data.name: PivotHeaderStyleFilterImageSpacing
data.value: This property is not in effect for the PivotHeaderStyle class.

data.name: PivotHeaderStyleSortingImageSpacing
data.value: This property is not in effect for the PivotHeaderStyle class.

data.name: WebPrefilterCriteriaString
data.value: Gets or sets the Prefilter's filter string.
